func.title: PV_Direction

param.name: factor
param.desc: Factor to multiply the angle with. The factor of 1000 is equal to a real factor of 1.0.

func.desc: The value depends on the current angle of movement of the particle. Usually the factor-parameter can be left out, since the original purpose of this function is to be used for the rotation-property.
func.remark: See the particle documentation for further explanations of the particle system.
